DBSheetConfig.query: SELECT isnull(T2.au_lname + ' ' + T2.au_fname, T1.au_id) au_id, T3.title AS title_id, T1.au_ord, T1.royaltyper FROM pubs.dbo.titleauthor T1 LEFT JOIN pubs.dbo.authors T2 ON T1.au_id = T2.au_id LEFT JOIN pubs.dbo.titles T3 ON T1.title_id = T3.title_id

field.name: *au_id
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.au_lname + ' ' + !T!.au_fname au_id,!T!.au_id FROM pubs.dbo.authors !T! ORDER BY !T!.au_lname

field.name: *title_id
field.lookup: SELECT title,title_id FROM pubs.dbo.titles ORDER BY title
